sen.e: On July 8, 1333, he made a sortie against the forces of overthrowing the Shogunate lead by Yoshisada NITTA and waged a fierce battle against the Nitta forces in the Kobukuro-zaka Slope, an important point for a traffic to the center of Kamakura, but finally he was hopelessly outnumbered and committed suicide in Susaki (around Fukazawa, Kamakura City, Kanagawa Prefecture).
